categories: Category:Military personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Ozz was a soldier in the Sith military during the Cold War.

In 3643 BBY, Ozz and several other soldiers were called to Sebaddon where the hex droids produced there had the potential to wipe out the entire galaxy. During the attack on the planet, Ozz was short on words, but willing to follow Larin Moxla's orders. They were commissioned by Larin to watch the weather so as not to land in a volcano.
